title.en: Applied Crafts Research and Heritage of Crafts

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Past and present responsibilities and roles of craft workers as creators of culture. The emergence, characteristics, main methods, approaches and current debates regarding crafts research. Scholars of crafts as participants in the crafts process. Estonian examples of the heritage of crafts: museums and enterprises.
description.et: Käsitöölise kui kultuurilooja vastutuse ja rolli teadvustamine ajaloos ja tänapäeval. Käsitööteaduse arengulugu, olemus, peamised meetodid, uurimissuunad ja jooksvad debatid. Käsitööteadur kui käsitööprotsessis osaleja. Eesti käsitööpärandi näide: muuseumid ja ettevõtted

objectives.en: To give students a systemic overview of the scope of crafts and the heritage of crafts, and of the main research approaches and methods, and to support their professional identification as practitioners and scholars of crafts.
objectives.et: Anda süstemaatiline ülevaade käsitöö ja käsitööpärandi määratlemise temaatikast, uurimissuundadest ja meetoditest ning toetada käsitöölise ja käsitööteaduri ajakohase enesepositsioneeringu kujunemist.

learning_outcomes.en: - are familiar with the concepts of crafts and the heritage of crafts;
- understand the role of the heritage of crafts in contemporary society and its historical development;
learning_outcomes.et: - mõistab käsitööpärandi rolli tänapäeva ühiskonnas ja ajaloolist arengudünaamikat;

learning_outcomes.en: - recognise their tasks and responsibilities as future specialists developing the field.
learning_outcomes.et: - teadvustab enese kui tulevase tipp-professionaali ülesandeid ja vastutust valdkonna arendamisel.

notes.et: Web lectures are recorded in Zoom and uploaded into Moodle.

independent_work.et:
1) oral presentation about the heritage craft institutions at your country about 15 min
2) oral presentation about heritage based craft entrepreneurs/designers at your country about 15 min
3) discussion seminar about books or articles 
4) written draft and presentation of the master thesis: preliminary title, description of the research object, research problem, main purpose (1-2), research questions, commentary on the literature, regards to your topic and preliminary list of publications (and other source materials: artefacts, photos etc.).

description.et: Heritage craft institutions at your country - oral presentation
Craft entrepreneurs at your country - oral presentation
Discussion of the home reading (2 articles)
Sufficient sketch of the master thesis: research problem, purpose, focus, overview of the field, preliminary list of publications and other source materials.

grade_evaluation.et: All presentations are made with passion and interest. Homereading done and discussed.

debt_elimination.et: To be agreed with Kristi and Ave.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
